snippet: The House lags behind the Senate on legislation to help the debt-ridden Postal Service, which could begin closing post offices in two weeks.
abstract: House lags behind Senate on legislation to help the debt-ridden Postal Service, which could begin closing offices after May 15 deadline; lawmakers do not appear to be in a hurry to proceed.
lead_paragraph: The House lags behind the Senate on legislation to help the debt-ridden Postal Service, which could begin closing post offices in two weeks.

headline.main: Fate of Postal Service Awaits Action in House
headline.print_headline: Fate of Postal Service Awaits Action in House
